|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MHF4 |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam = |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U98H135 |manuf_rev = .00 |addchip = |flags = Wave2, VHT80, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 4.2, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = reference design |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 11/02/2018 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :OEM: [[Foxconn]] (Hon Hai) U98H135.[https://www.ebay.com/itm/L44431-001-RTL8822CE-GENUINE-HP-WIRELESS-CARD-11-AK-11-AK1035NR-CA712/274114024342 00] {{See also|Realtek reference design}} *[[Realtek#ac|Realtek]] RTL8822CE - PCIe 1.1 (WLAN)/USB 2.0 (BT) :802.11abgn+ac 2T2R (2x2:2), Wave2, MU-MIMO, BT 4.2 *[[Realtek RTL8822CE Combo Module]] (10ec:c822) :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8822CE Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8822CE TX2-RTL8822CE] (2018-11-02) :IC: 6317A-RTL8822CE, 3.3V/1.5A ==Links of Interest== *[http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/10ec/c822 PCI ID: '''10ec:c822''' on ''pci-ids.ucw.cz''] ([https://devicehunt.com/view/type/pci/vendor/10EC/device/C822 DH])
